metadata.title: Landing Page Navigation to Products Page

story.iWant: to easily navigate from the landing page to the products page
story.soThat: I can quickly start browsing products

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: The landing page contains a clear button or link labeled "View Products" or similar.
Clicking this button/link navigates the user to the dedicated "Products" page.
The button/link is responsive and functional across mobile, tablet, and PC devices.

doc.snippet: The frontend work will involve creating React components within the defined project structure, primarily src/pages/Products.jsx, src/pages/LandingPage.jsx...

dependency.reason: The core dependency for handling client-side routing in React.

constraints.constraint: UI components should be built using the `shadcn/ui` library (e.g., Button).

tests.standards: E2E tests using Playwright are the primary method for validating navigation and user flows. [Source: .bmad-ephemeral/stories/tech-spec-epic-1.md]

ideas.idea: Write an E2E test that loads the root ('/'), clicks the 'View Products' button, and asserts that the browser URL becomes '/products'.
Run the E2E test across different viewport sizes to ensure the button is always clickable.
